author: Stereogum
title: Preview Do Make Say Think’s First New Song In 8 Years
text: Toronto post-rockers and Broken Social Scene associates Do Make Say Think haven't released an album since 2009's Other Truths, but their label Constellation Records has been teasing the band's first new music in 8 years in a series of Instagram posts . The teasers include a minute-long clip of a song … More »
